title: Authors and Citation
text: White RA (2023). norsyss: Norwegian Syndromic Surveillance System. R package version 2023.3.18, https://github.com/norsyss/norsyss.
code: @Manual{,   title = {norsyss: Norwegian Syndromic Surveillance System},   author = {Richard Aubrey White},   year = {2023},   note = {R package version 2023.3.18},   url = {https://github.com/norsyss/norsyss}, }

title: Norwegian Syndromic Surveillance System
text: Surveillance Core 9 (“norsyss”) free open-source framework real-time analysis disease surveillance. Read introduction vignette run help(package="norsyss").

title: Norwegian Syndromic Surveillance System
text: csverse set R packages developed help solve problems frequently occur performing disease surveillance. want install dev versions (access packages haven’t released CRAN), run usethis::edit_r_profile() edit .Rprofile. write : Save file restart R. can now install csverse packages drat repository.
code: options(   repos = structure(c(     CSVERSE = "https://www.csids.no/drat/",     CRAN    = "https://cran.rstudio.com"   )) ) install.packages("norsyss")
